ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, and to think all this started from one post stating dissaproval of a guild... I meant no dissrespect to the Bardic guild in question. What they are trying
ygData.messageBody:
heh, and to think all this started from one post stating dissaproval
of a guild...

I meant no dissrespect to the Bardic guild in question. What they are
trying to do is take roleplaying to one more level which is quite
admirable in my belief. But that is all it is, a belief. Again I
apologize for sounding brash in any way, my mouth tends to get me into
trouble anyway. (Most Orcs don't like being reminded of their large
rear ends...)

Regardless, I had hoped this mailing list wouldn't turn into a debate
between us, for we should use this opportunity to help each other in
the difficult world of a Norrath community. Not to slander each other.
Perhaps my meaning was misunderstood before I had scrybed it down. I
again apologize.

I also hope this can end our debate so that we can focus our attention
to matters of bardic excellence.
